style_guide.render_engine: High-fidelity 3D render, likely Blender or Cinema 4D style
style_guide.lighting: Soft studio lighting with a slight technological glow/bloom. Clean shadows.
style_guide.background: Isolated on white or transparent background
style_guide.vibe: Modern, futuristic, clean, corporate blockchain technology, trustworthy

prompts.name: cross_chain_bridge
prompts.subject: Two distinct floating platforms connected by a glowing digital bridge
prompts.details: Platform A and Platform B are stylized distinct blockchain islands (maybe different geometric bases). A beam of blue light or a glass bridge connects them. Data packets (small cubes) travelling along the bridge.
prompts.colors: Platforms in slate gray and white, bridge in vibrant primary blue (#0090ff) with teal accents.

prompts.name: relayer_bot
prompts.subject: A friendly, high-tech automation robot or drone
prompts.details: Floating, streamlined spherical or capsule-shaped robot. It has an antenna or a signal dish. It is carrying a digital payload (a glowing block). It looks efficient and fast.
prompts.colors: Body in white and glossy blue (#0090ff). LED indicators in teal. Metal parts in silver/slate.

prompts.name: attestation_document
prompts.subject: A floating digital contract with a verification seal
prompts.details: A glass or holographic tablet displaying a smart contract code. A large, glowing 3D checkmark or wax seal floats in front of it, signifying 'verified' or 'attested'.
prompts.colors: Tablet in translucent blue glass. Seal in vibrant teal or gold (if acceptable, otherwise blue). Code lines in white.

prompts.name: usdc_token
prompts.subject: A stylized 3D coin representing a stablecoin
prompts.details: A thick, coin-shaped object with the dollar sign '$' or a generic currency symbol embossed or floating in the center. The edge has ridges like a traditional coin but made of digital blocks.
prompts.colors: Coin body in clean white or silver. The symbol is glowing primary blue (#0090ff).

prompts.name: cctp_detector
prompts.subject: A radar or scanning device
prompts.details: A futuristic dish or magnifying glass scanning a blockchain block. It is emitting a fan of light (the scan zone) to detect events.
prompts.colors: Base in dark blue (#0d2847). Scanning light in translucent teal. The block being scanned is slate gray.

prompts.name: blockchain_network
prompts.subject: A network of interconnected cubes
prompts.details: Several floating cubes connected by thin lines or pipes. One cube is highlighted or glowing, representing the current active node.
prompts.colors: Cubes in frosted glass or white plastic. Connections in blue neon. Highlighted cube in vibrant blue.
